tool_description: The Nitro API provides automated access to Nitro, a professional human-powered translation service with support for 70+ languages.
name: Nitro
title: Nitro

api_list.name: Get a Specific Order
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves a specific order.

api_list.name: Account
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nitro.p.rapidapi.com/account"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nitro.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Orders
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves all account orders.
